<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Unify version metadata.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// \\return true if changes are made.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Assume the named metadata has operands each of which is a pair of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// integer constant, e.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// !Name = &#123;!n1, !n2&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// !n1 = &#123;i32 1, i32 2&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// !n2 = &#123;i32 2, i32 0&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Keep the largest version as the sole operand if PickFirst is false.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Otherwise pick it from the first value, representing kernel module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp-/#a42808949a508a2f6e635b6ae584adcd5"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp-/#a42808949a508a2f6e635b6ae584adcd5">unifyVersionMD</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PickFirst) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;NamedMD = M.getNamedMetadata(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NamedMD || NamedMD-&gt;getNumOperands() &lt;= 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;MaxMD = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxVer = 0U;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;VersionMD : NamedMD-&gt;operands()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VersionMD-&gt;getNumOperands() == 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CMajor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mdconst/#ad938857d6c6603847adf3a8cbe403d17">mdconst::extract&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(VersionMD-&gt;getOperand(0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VersionMajor = CMajor-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CMinor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mdconst/#ad938857d6c6603847adf3a8cbe403d17">mdconst::extract&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(VersionMD-&gt;getOperand(1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VersionMinor = CMinor-&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ver = (VersionMajor &#42; 100) + (VersionMinor &#42; 10);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ver &gt; MaxVer) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">          MaxVer = Ver;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">          MaxMD = VersionMD;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PickFirst)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">      NamedMD-&gt;eraseFromParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">      NamedMD = M.getOrInsertNamedMetadata(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">      NamedMD-&gt;addOperand(MaxMD);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Unify version metadata.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return true if changes are made.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Assume the named metadata has operands each of which is a list e.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// !n1 = !&#123;!&quot;cl&#95;khr&#95;fp16&quot;, &#123;!&quot;cl&#95;khr&#95;fp64&quot;&#125;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// !n2 = !&#123;!&quot;cl&#95;khr&#95;image&quot;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Combine it into a single list with unique operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp-/#afe1326abb7803c9088d08b7348c8b5e6"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuunifymetadata-cpp-/#afe1326abb7803c9088d08b7348c8b5e6">unifyExtensionMD</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
